description:
Speaker: Sebastian Neubauer

Track:PyConDE
Local development of python code inside a docker container is surprisingly broken. In this talk I will walk you through the proper setup of a local python development environment using docker.

Recorded at the PyConDE & PyData Berlin 2019 conference.
https://pycon.de

More details at the conference page: https://de.pycon.org/program/A7FWAW
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pydataberlin
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/pyconde
title: 6 Years of Docker: The Good, the Bad and Python Packaging
